restaurant_description: Bacon ipsum dolor amet flank doner pastrami, ham hock sausage andouille short loin tongue rump. Flank kielbasa meatloaf, capicola swine sausage landjaeger short loin turkey bacon jowl strip steak beef ribs meatball. Short loin prosciutto hamburger picanha shankle chuck.
